text: Rank insignia in the Irish Defence Forces are an indication of the wearer's military rank, and worn by officers and other members of Ireland's Defence Forces as an element of their uniform, typically on a single chest tab or as a shoulder board. ==Irish Army== ===Officer ranks=== {| style="border:1px solid #8888aa; background-color:#f7f8ff; padding:5px; font-size:95%; margin: 0px 12px 12px 0px; width: 100%" |- style="text-align:center;" ! Combat | colspan=2| 50px | colspan=2| 50px | colspan=2| 50px | colspan=2| 50px | colspan=2| 50px | colspan=2| 50px | colspan=2| 50px | colspan=3| 50px | colspan=3| 50px | colspan=6| 50px | colspan=6| 50px |- style="text-align:center;" ! Designation | Corporal, 2 star | Corporal, 1 star |} ==Irish Air Corps== Irish Air Corps rank insignia are an indication of the wearer's military rank, and worn by officers and other members of the Irish Air Corps as an element of their uniform. ==Irish Naval Service== ;Officers {| style="border:1px solid #8888aa; background-color:#f7f8ff; padding:5px; font-size:95%; margin: 0px 12px 12px 0px;" |} ;Enlisted {| style="border:1px solid #8888aa; background- color:#f7f8ff; padding:5px; font-size:95%; margin: 0px 12px 12px 0px;" |} File:IE Navy Rank Insignia-WO-Executive.svg|Executive File:IE Navy Rank Insignia-WO-Administrative.svg|Administrative File:IE Navy Rank Insignia-WO- Engineering.svg|Engineering File:IE Navy Rank Insignia-WO- Communications.svg|Communications ===Naval reserve=== Prior to 2002 ranks for NCOs in the Naval Reserve were in blue instead of gold. {| style="border:1px solid #8888aa; background-color:#f7f8ff; padding:5px; font-size:95%; margin: 0px 12px 12px 0px;" |- style="text-align:center;" ! rowspan=2 | Ireland (edit) | colspan=6 rowspan=2| Unknown | colspan=2| 70px | colspan=2| 70px | colspan=6| 70px | colspan=6| 70px | colspan=4| 70px | colspan=2| 50px | colspan=6| 50px | colspan=2| No insignia |- style="text-align:center;" | colspan=2| Senior chief petty officer Ard-mhion-oifigeach sinsearach | colspan=2| Chief petty officer Ard-mhion-oifigeach | colspan=6| Senior petty officer Mion-oifigeach sinsearach | colspan=6| Petty officer Mion-oifigeach | colspan=4| Leading seaman Mairnéalach ceannais | colspan=2| Able seaman Mairnéalach inniúil | colspan=6| Ordinary seaman Mairnéalach | colspan=2| Seaman recruit Recruit |} ==Notes== ==Citations== ==Bibliography== * ==External links== * Category:Defence Forces (Ireland) military insignia Ireland
